CANNOT_EDIT_THE_BOT: Could not edit the bot, an error ocurred
MISSING_ID_PROPERTY: Could not edit a bot without `_id` property
CANNOT_CREATE_THE_BOT: Could not create the bot, an error ocurred
BOT_ALREADY_EXISTS: Can not add a bot that already exists
SOME_PROPERTIES_IS_MISSING: Some properties is missing to add bot
